alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Huntington; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Blackford, southeastern Huntington, central Adams, Wells and northwestern Jay Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1013 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bluffton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ossian around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Monroe and Decatur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
